items.sentence: Just as I was about to go out, it started raining.
I was dressed up as a girl at the school festival.
My grandparents were already dead when I was born.
I want to thank them for everything they're doing.
I found a stray dog on my way home. Can I keep it?
This isn't as hard to do as I thought it would be.
What time do you think you're likely to get there?
I didn't realize Tom and Mary both should do that.
Playing baseball helps Tom be more self-confident.
Tom was drinking beer, and Mary was drinking wine.
Tom thanked me for helping him decorate his house.
Tom sometimes got teased for being slow at school.
Tom showed Mary the letter he got from his father.
Tom has been asking us a lot of strange questions.
I asked Tom to explain to me what his problem was.
I still don't understand why Tom hates me so much.
I did everything I could do, but it wasn't enough.
Are you sure that you don't need to buy more food?
Jupiter is the largest planet in the Solar System.
This is the most beautiful ostrich I've ever seen.
